recipesJson.name: Lemon Custard
recipesJson.author: RedWagonVapes
recipesJson.description: This is inspired by vapetasias lemon custard. This is also my first shared mix. Strong lemon inhale with creamy custard notes not an over powered custard.

reviews.text: Gotta give it to you. This is a really good lemon custard. I have been vaping it nonstop. I mixed a 120ml of this and Iâ€™m enjoying every bit of it!
